verses.verse: So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "I am a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H3117>today;<s%> I am <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3318>come<s%> and <S%H935>go,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> to me, 'You shall not <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>'

"It is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> who will <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H6440>ahead<s%> of you; He will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and you shall <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> them. <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> is the one who will <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H6440>ahead<s%> of you, <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> to them <S%H9201>just<s%> as He <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and <S%H5747>Og,<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and to their <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> He <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them.

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them up <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to them according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

"Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous,<s%> do not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> or <S%H6206>tremble<s%> at them, for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is the one who <S%H1980>goes<s%> with you. He will not <S%H7503>fail<s%> you or <S%H5800>forsake<s%> you."

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous,<s%> for you shall <S%H935>go<s%> with <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to their fathers to <S%H1>give<s%> them, and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it to them as an <S%H5157>inheritance.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the one who <S%H1980>goes<s%> <S%H6440>ahead<s%> of you; He will be with you. He will not <S%H7503>fail<s%> you or <S%H5800>forsake<s%> you. Do not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> or be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> who <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of [every] <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> at the <S%H4150>time<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H8059>remission<s%> of debts, at the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H5521>Booths,<s%>

when <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> at the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He will <S%H977>choose,<s%> you shall <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> in <S%H5048>front<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in their <S%H241>hearing.<s%>

<S%H6950>"Assemble<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> and the <S%H802>women<s%> and <S%H2945>children<s%> and the <S%H1616>alien<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is in your <S%H8179>town,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that they may <S%H8085>hear<s%> and <S%H3925>learn<s%> and <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8451>law.<s%>

"And their <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have not <S%H3045>known,<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> and <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as <S%H3605>long<s%> <S%H3117><s%> as you <S%H2416>live<s%> on the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you are about to <S%H5674>cross<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H3423>possess.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>time<s%> for you to <S%H4191>die<s%> is <S%H7126>near;<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H3320>present<s%> yourselves at the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> that I may <S%H6680>commission<s%> him." So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3320>presented<s%> themselves at the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> you are about to <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> with your fathers; and <S%H1>this<s%> <S%H2088>people<s%> will <S%H5971>arise<s%> and <S%H6965>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with the <S%H2181>strange<s%> <S%H5236>gods<s%> of the <S%H430>land,<s%> into the <S%H776>midst<s%> of <S%H7130>which<s%> they are <S%H834>going,<s%> and will <S%H935>forsake<s%> Me and <S%H5800>break<s%> My <S%H6565>covenant<s%> <S%H1285>which<s%> I have <S%H834>made<s%> with them.

"Then My <S%H639>anger<s%> will be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against them in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and I will <S%H5800>forsake<s%> them and <S%H5641>hide<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> from them, and they shall be <S%H398>consumed,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H9567>evils<s%> and <S%H6869>troubles<s%> shall <S%H4672>come<s%> upon them; so that they will <S%H559>say<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> 'Is it not <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is not <S%H7130>among<s%> us that <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H9567>evils<s%> have <S%H4672>come<s%> upon us?'

"But I will <S%H5641>surely<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they will <S%H6213>do,<s%> for they will <S%H6437>turn<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9598>song<s%> for yourselves, and <S%H3925>teach<s%> it to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> it on their <S%H6310>lips,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9598>song<s%> may be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> for Me against the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"For when I <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their fathers, and they have <S%H1>eaten<s%> and are <S%H398>satisfied<s%> and <S%H7646>become<s%> <S%H1878>prosperous,<s%> then they will <S%H1878>turn<s%> to <S%H6437>other<s%> <S%H312>gods<s%> and <S%H430>serve<s%> them, and <S%H5647>spurn<s%> Me and <S%H5006>break<s%> My <S%H6565>covenant.<s%>

"Then it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about, <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H9567>evils<s%> and <S%H6869>troubles<s%> have <S%H4672>come<s%> upon them, that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9598>song<s%> will <S%H6030>testify<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them as a <S%H5707>witness<s%> (for it shall not be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> from the <S%H6310>lips<s%> of their <S%H2233>descendants<s%>); for I <S%H3045>know<s%> their <S%H3336>intent<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they are <S%H6213>developing<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> I have <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9598>song<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H3925>taught<s%> it to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then He <S%H6680>commissioned<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous,<s%> for you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to them, and I will be with you."

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H3789>writing<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were <S%H8552>complete,<s%>
that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H7760>place<s%> it <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H6654><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> that it may <S%H1961>remain<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> as a <S%H5707>witness<s%> against you.

"For I <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H4805>rebellion<s%> and your <S%H7186>stubbornness<s%><S%H6203>;<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> while I am <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> with you <S%H3117>today,<s%> you have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H637>how<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H637>more,<s%> <S%H3588><s%> then, <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H4194>death<s%>?

<S%H6950>"Assemble<s%> to me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes<s%> and your <S%H7860>officers,<s%> that I may <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in their <S%H241>hearing<s%> and <S%H5749>call<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H5749>witness<s%> against them.

"For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H4194>death<s%> you will <S%H7843>act<s%> <S%H7843>corruptly<s%> and <S%H5493>turn<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you; and <S%H9567>evil<s%> will <S%H7122>befall<s%> you in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> for you will <S%H6213>do<s%> that <S%H7451>which<s%> is <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3707>provoking<s%> Him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9598>song,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were complete: <S%H8552><s%>
